Header.title: Your Event, Our Expertise
Header.paragraph: Professional Event Solutions for Your Every Need

About.paragraph: PT. GODIVA SURYA ABADI specializes in the events and exhibitions industry, providing everything needed for a successful event. Despite being a newly established company, our team consists of experienced professionals who have successfully managed both national and international events, such as INDOLIVESTOCK, IIMS, and GIIAS. Our motto, ``We stand for your excellence,`` drives us to deliver the best to our clients.

Gallery.title: Special Booth Kementerian Pertahanan at INDODEFENCE 2024
Hidea Outboard Engine at Indonesia International Motor Show (IIMS) 2024.
Suzuki Marine at Deep & Extreme Indonesia (DXI) 2024.
